title: Titration of HA - initial acid concentration

content.question: The volume of the <math alttext="H A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>HA</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> solution that was titrated was <math alttext="10.0 milliliters" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>10.0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>mL</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>. What was the initial concentration of the <math alttext="H A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>HA</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> solution?

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
